Text: Can you upload EP2 if you have??

on http://www.mtv.com/ontv/dyn/bams_unholy_union/series.jhtml#/ontv/dyn/bams_unholy_union/episode/episode.jhtml?episodeId=111615

Just wanted to say, to my surprise that link to MTV actually works pretty well. You can't save the file to your computer but at least you can watch episode 2. I hate to admit it but I like this show. It's kind of 'chicky' but Bam is pretty hilarious. He reminds me of Billy Madison.
dude, u can watch every episode at mtv.com, just type Bams Unholy Union in the search field. Then  just click on the links..
